name: articus/path-handler

suggest.doctrine/annotations: It is required for Articus\PathHandler\MetadataProvider\Annotation (default metadata provider).
suggest.psr/simple-cache: It is required for Articus\PathHandler\MetadataProvider\Annotation (default metadata provider).
suggest.laminas/laminas-stdlib: It is required for Articus\PathHandler\MetadataProvider\Annotation (default metadata provider).
